dialogueacts.text: Um remotes are being considered ugly .

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: uh seventy five percent of the um people questioned uh indicated that they thought their remote were was ugly .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: Um and an additional eighty percent indicated that they would spend more money on a fancy-looking remote control .
dialogueacts.label: inf

dialogueacts.text: Um in addition remotes were not very functional .

dialogueacts.speaker: D
dialogueacts.text: Fifty percent of the people indicated they only loo used about ten percent of the buttons on a remote control .
